Platinum

Name:Platinum
Formula:Pt
Atomic Number:78
Group:10
Block:d
Atomic Mass:195.084
Discovery Date:1750
Appearance:A shiny, silvery-white metal.

Uses:

  • Jewellery
  • Catalytic Converters
  • Soldering
Platinum records are actually made out of coloured plastic.
